description: a(n) = T(n,n-1), array T as in A050143. Also T(2n+1,n), array T as in A055807.
formula: G.f.: x*((-x^2+4*x+1)/(2*sqrt(x^2-6*x+1))-x/2+1/2). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Nov 25 2014a(n) = C(2*n-3,n-2) + sum(i=0..n-2, C(n,i+1)*C(n+i-2,n-2)). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Nov 25 2014
prog: (Maxima) a(n):=if n=1 then 1 else sum((binomial(n,i+1))*binomial(n+i-2,n-2),i,0,n-2)+binomial(2*n-3,n-2); /* _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Nov 25 2014 */
author: _Clark Kimberling_
